Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: 4217 Currency Names And Code Elements: Add ZWG Zimbabwe Gold, XCG Caribbean Guilder, XAD Arab Accounting Dinar.
Australian Standard Classification Of Languages (ASCL): Added 2025 8-digit codes; the 2016 4-digit codes are retained for legacy.
4217 Currency Names And Code Elements: Remove CUC Cuban Peso Convertible, ZWL Zimbabwe Dollar, ANG Netherlands Antillean Guilder.
Federal Electorate: Remove Higgins, North Sydney.
